title.narrative: 5.2 COMMUNICATION: INCREASED AWARENESS & ENGAGEMENT IN PROMOTING CHILD RIGHTS

description.narrative: Key actors and civil society, including children, adolescents and their families, are more aware of the needs of Palestinian children and are more engaged in alliances for child rights

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Key actors and civil society, including children, adolescents and their families, are more aware of the needs of Palestinian children and are more engaged in alliances for child rights

description.narrative: UNICEF led the United Nation's advocacy on promoting the 30th anniversary of the CRC in the State of Palestine. It developed key documents to assist in this promotion and, through its leadership of the UN Communications Group, ensured joined-up messaging and amplification, particularly on social media. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2020
